Pre-Game Insights: The Cincinnati Reds are calling up Rhett Lowder to pitch against the Milwaukee Brewers on August 30, 2024. Lowder has shown promise in the minors but faces a challenging debut due to the team's depleted starting rotation.
Rhett Lowder's performance in the minors, including a solid stretch in Triple-A, suggests he could be a viable option despite the high-pressure environment of the MLB stage.
